Package com.doa.engine

Class DoaWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.doa.engine.DoaWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public final class DoaWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Responsible for providing a windowing tool for DoaEngine.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 1.0
    Version:
    2.7
    Author:
    Doga Oruc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
